dcterms:creator: S. G. Armato, 3rd
dcterms:description: The LIDC/IDRI dataset is an open dataset collected retrospectively from seven academic centers, prepared using the officially recommended toolkit 'pylidc'. It includes manually annotated nodule masks, diagnostic labels, and manifestations for lung nodules on CT scans.
dcterms:title: LIDC/IDRI (Lung Image Database Consortium / Image Database Resource Initiative)

dcterms:description: An in-house dataset collected retrospectively from The First Affiliated Hospital of Nanjing Medical University, containing 816 nodules from 816 participants, used to differentiate invasive lung cancer with micropapillary or solid pattern.
dcterms:title: In-house dataset
